title: VALDETARO, M
text:
(www.semf.org.es)[www.semf.org.es]



mvtta.github.io (currently under work)





marianas.life (currently under work)




Stone Technology



Short film: An ode to metamorphic stone



Mini Doc “The Jewel”

Gentlewoman scientist, thinker, and poet. Seeing patterns in how things become systems, and how groups of systems make up higher-order things. With attention, while caring deeply about most of these things, in particular and general form, deep-diving into their governing relations, origin and future.
Active board member of the Society for Multidisciplinary and Fundamental Research, creating spaces for discussing fundamental questions.
